page.title: 02 The Parish Council
page.content: The Parish Council plays an important part in the life of the local community. The council,which meets once a month is divided into many committees each responsible for different areas of council policy. These are the crane valley, burial grounds and churchyards , town planning, street lighting and litter, recreation, the vestry hall, and finance. At present the council is concerned with toilet facilities in the vestry hall , the war memorial , lighting provisions , and litter bins and tombstone repairs in the churchyard . Vandalism and graffiti are a cause for concern , as are the problems of bored youngsters and noisy motorbikes . The council is now concerned with the old cinema becoming a supermarket .
